file_content.text: C--Corso? Is that you? How did...? I didn't think I was ever... oh....
I heard they took in strangers who were new to the planet.
They locked me up and... were they going to eat me?
You're a "gift of flesh" from the desert. They were meant to eat you.
Didn't you hear the man?
Ooh. I think I'm gonna--blarf....
Don't tease him, Captain.
You're okay, Jet. But... how did you end up here? I thought Syreena got everyone.
They're gone. They won't be hurting anyone again.
You're safe now.
How did you end up here, Jet? I thought Syreena got the whole crew.
I had the sec cameras wired to my comm. I saw it all go down. Started running and didn't stop 'til I hit Tatooine.
If you'd stood up for yourself, you wouldn't have ended up on the menu.
You should have fought back.
Jettison's a slicer, Captain, not a killer.
Was a slicer. Now I don't even have that.
I was trying to start over. After what Syreena did... I've been too scared to go into anyone's systems.
It was kind of a game to me, working for Viidu. It never really hit home that we were committing crimes. That people could die....
Well, your peaceful village plan's a bust. What next?
What are you going to do now?
I... I don't know. I've got nowhere to turn.
It's rough to lose friends like that.
I'm sorry.
I've got no one. No place to go. No money. I was hoping I could take something from Viidu, but....
You work for a man like Viidu, you're not in it for the retirement package.
That's how crime works.
I never thought about it. The HoloNet just always came easy to me, you know.
And now everyone I know is dead, and I'm in this forsaken wasteland, and....
Corso, is there anything you...?
Don't worry, Jet. We'll take care of you. Won't we, Captain?
If you want to do right by the kid, who am I to argue?
You're the boss on this one.
Go to Anchorhead. Should be some people there who owe me and the captain a good turn.
I'll try to set you up with some legit work. I think you've had enough of the wild side.
I'll say!
Any valuables here are up for grabs. Take what you need, kid.
We'll help you start over.
The separatists are finished back on Ord, Jettison. The captain helped wipe 'em clean.
I'll make sure you've got enough to get a good start. Maybe find legitimate security work.
Thank you, Corso. I can't think of anyone from the old crew I'd rather have find me.
There's no one more loyal than Corso, Captain. You're lucky to have him.
You want my help, you've got to make it worthwhile.
Work for me.
I told the captain, you're the best slicer I've seen. It'd be like working for Viidu again. But safer.
I got nowhere else. If you trust her, I'm not going to argue.
I got no other options. If you trust him, so do I.
Sign me up.
I'll tell you where to go. We've got a kind of base, called Port Nowhere....
